name: get_dm_conversations
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twttrapi.
Tool description: (Discord server: https://discord.gg/TKJJYppYKj) TwttrAPI is an unofficial X (Twitter) API with various features for easy access to X data. It supports X Login + 2FA, tweet retrieval, user and search results, content interaction, tweet creation/deletion, and direct message access. It's ideal for scraping public data or building X API-based applications. Reach us at contact@twttrapi.com for custom plans and inquiries.
API description: Fetches direct message conversations and messages from the Twitter API using the provided session and optional parameters.

twttr_session.description: The session token for authenticating with the Twitter API.

twttr_proxy.description: Optional proxy URL to route the request through.

cursor.description: Optional cursor token to paginate through the result set.
